ch0022_00_urup/0101_0701_02_10: You’re glimmering like the shiniest shard of ice!
ch0022_00_urup/0101_0701_03_10:
Looking at fresh ice is always nice.
Keep up the good work, y’know?
ch0022_00_urup/0601_0701_01_10:
You’re wondering whether I get cold dressed
like this all year?
ch0022_00_urup/0601_0701_02_10:
I’m sure there are people around you that spend
the year in short sleeves, y’know?
ch0022_00_urup/0601_0701_03_10:
Those people have blazing spirits! That’s why
the cold doesn’t bother them.
ch0022_00_urup/0601_0702_01_10: I mean, I get cold, too, y’know?
ch0022_00_urup/0601_0702_02_10:
If you’re not 100 percent on your game all the
time, you have to find a way to keep warm.
ch0022_00_urup/0602_0701_01_10:
Ice is a bit of a paradox, y’know?
It’s both durable and fragile.
ch0022_00_urup/0602_0701_02_10: Fragile when warm and durable when cold.
ch0022_00_urup/0602_0701_03_10:
Power is just as fickle. 
But that is what makes it fun.
ch0022_00_urup/0602_0701_04_10:
I like to cherish the kind of power that can be
lost in a moment.
ch0022_00_urup/0602_0702_01_10:
Now, the kind of power that is unshakable, the
kind that will never change no matter what...
ch0022_00_urup/0602_0702_02_10:
I want you to have the kind of spirit that would
be able to find it.
ch0022_00_urup/0603_0701_01_10:
I always enjoy my Pokémon battles with my
trusty Avalugg.
ch0022_00_urup/0603_0701_02_10:
In any case, you can say the one who enjoys
themselves the most is the winner, y’know?
ch0022_00_urup/0603_0701_03_10:
Time is limited. We don’t have the kind of time
to think about things like winning or losing.
ch0022_00_urup/0603_0702_01_10:
I’m impressed with how you 
interact with your Pokémon.
ch0022_00_urup/0603_0702_02_10:
There are Trainers that want to become stronger
or maybe become closer to their Pokémon.
ch0022_00_urup/0603_0702_03_10:
Just like how no two people have 
the same thoughts, the same can be said 
for Pokémon as well.
ch0022_00_urup/0603_0702_04_10:
So being able to have fun alongside your
Pokémon is an incredibly precious thing.
ch0022_00_urup/0604_0701_01_10:
I may be hard as ice, but my wife 
can easily make me melt.
ch0022_00_urup/0604_0701_02_10:
She asked me about “it” the other day, y’know?
And I couldn’t answer her.
ch0022_00_urup/0604_0701_03_10:
All I could say was, “Oh yeah, that’s a few days
away, isn’t it?” She got mad at me...
ch0022_00_urup/0604_0701_04_10: I mean, what is “it” anyway, y’know?
ch0022_00_urup/0604_0701_05_10:
It must’ve been our anniversary! Yeesh! 
We all have something we’re not good at.
ch0022_00_urup/0604_0702_01_10:
I can be tough as an iceberg, hot as a furnace,
but there’s one thing that I cannot stand up to.
ch0022_00_urup/0604_0702_02_10:
My wife’s cold stare. 
It’s something I could never get used to.
ch0022_00_urup/0605_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], do you know about
the Pokémon village?
ch0022_00_urup/0605_0701_02_10:
It’s a place where hurt Pokémon go to rest and
support each other.
ch0022_00_urup/0605_0701_03_10:
I hope you get the chance to go there. I’m sure
it will make you even kinder toward Pokémon.
ch0022_00_urup/0605_0702_01_10:
Unfortunately, there are bad people that
hurt Pokémon.
ch0022_00_urup/0605_0702_02_10:
If you ever find a hurt Pokémon, I hope you care
for it. You have a good heart. I’m sure you will.
ch0022_00_urup/1701_0701_01_10: I found this caught in one of Avalugg’s cracks.
ch0022_00_urup/1701_0701_02_10: Here, you can have it. Use it well.
ch0022_00_urup/1701_0702_01_10:
Avalugg has really big cracks, so if you don’t
clean them often, you’ll find a bunch of things 
caught in there!
ch0022_00_urup/1701_0702_02_10:
I once lost a present I meant to give to my kids,
but I found it in one of Avalugg’s cracks!
Ha ha! *sigh*
ch0022_00_urup/2501_0701_01_10:
I might be a Gym Leader, but I can only be one
thanks to the support I get from my family.
ch0022_00_urup/2501_0701_02_10:
My wife and kids are always there,
cheering me on.
ch0022_00_urup/2501_0701_03_10:
It’s thanks to them that I can give it my all when
I battle.
ch0022_00_urup/2501_0702_01_10:
My locket with a picture of my family is 
my most important possession, y’know?
ch0022_00_urup/2501_0702_02_10:
I never leave home without it!
It reminds me how grateful I should be to them!
ch0022_00_urup/2501_0702_03_10:
Besides, y’know... It’s nice to think 
that your family is always with you.
ch0022_00_urup/2511_0701_01_10: Spending time with you warms my heart.
ch0022_00_urup/2511_0701_02_10:
Both people and Pokémon alike have hearts.
I’m just saying that you have a warmth that
is soothing to those around you.
ch0022_00_urup/2511_0701_03_10: At the very least, Avalugg here and I like you!
ch0022_00_urup/2511_0701_04_10:
I bet the people and Pokémon that approach
you can see that you have a kind heart, too.
ch0022_00_urup/2511_0702_01_10:
One warm person can warm up 
everyone around them.
ch0022_00_urup/2511_0702_02_10:
And if there’s a frigid knucklehead around,
well, that’s where you come in, y’know?
ch0022_00_urup/3001_0701_01_10:
Hi! The morning air always fills me with vigor.
Isn’t it refreshing?
ch0022_00_urup/3002_0701_01_10:
Y’know, I woke up around five this morning.
I just can’t seem to get good shut-eye lately.
ch0022_00_urup/3003_0701_01_10:
Hey, how’re you doing?
We should have a battle one of these days.
ch0022_00_urup/3004_0701_01_10:
Hey there. Pokémon battling is always
a good way to spend the day.
ch0022_00_urup/3005_0701_01_10:
You’re out and about awfully late.
You shouldn’t overexert yourself, you know.
ch0022_00_urup/3006_0701_01_10:
Goin’ out at this time of night?
Well, just don’t stay up too late.
